name: 3dClustCount
author: RW Cox
description: This program takes as input 1 or more datasets, thresholds them at various levels, and counts up the number of clusters of various sizes.

inputs.description: Prefix of the filename into which results will be summed. Actual filename will be 'sss.clustcount.niml'. If this file already exists, results from the current run will be summed into the existing results and the file then re-written.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Output results in a format similar to 3dClustSim -- as 1D and NIML formatted files with probabilities of various cluster sizes. This option can be used without any input datasets to create final output files from saved '.clustcount.niml' output file from earlier runs.
inputs.name: Final flag

inputs.description: Suppresses progress reports and other informational messages. Should be placed first in the command line to quiet most messages.
inputs.name: Quiet flag

output-files.description: Summed results file in NIML format.
output-files.name: Cluster count NIML file

output-files.description: Summed results file in 1D format (when '-final' is used).
output-files.name: Cluster count 1D file

output-files.description: Summed results file in NIML format (when '-final' is used).
output-files.name: Final Cluster count NIML file
